website_summaries.verdict: A high quality wooden high chair that is adjustable and will last your child for years.
pros: Easily adjusts from a high chair all the way to a regular dining chair with no tools needed
Straps can be a 5-point or 3-point harness
Cushion is stain resistant and waterproof for easy cleaning and the tray cover is dishwasher safe
Easy to assemble and very sturdy
cons: You need 2 hands to remove the wooden tray

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair for feeding therapy!
customer_reviews.text: I am a pediatric speech pathologist and feeding and swallowing specialist who bought this chair for my practice. I received it just about a week ago and used it for the first time yesterday. I love this chair! It provides great support and stability, which is key to proper oral motor functioning when eating and swallowing. The adjustable seat and footrests allow me to successfully position both little and big clients for therapy sessions. It was so easy to clean and I love how effortlessly the straps can be removed for washing. An added bonus is that it is so good looking. I love the green cushion. All of my therapists are excited to use it in their treatments, too!
customer_reviews.author: stacy payne

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair! It's not massive but works great for our wobbly 6 month old. He sits up nice and tall! He was 2 months early so his therapists wanted to make sure he had a five point harness, and a place for his feet and arms that is adjustable, it's perfect. It does have one handed cover removal but needs two hands to remove the entire tray. Excited to try many more foods in this high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Hate it. Not for us.
customer_reviews.text: I hate this chair. I wish I had never bought it. Stain comes off when we clean it. Turns the rags orange. Food gets in between the seat cushion and straps making it difficult to clean. The cushions are easily bendable, so your little one can take their dirty hands and grab the cushion, pull, and now you have a dirty cushion and dirty wood. It’s so annoying how the table part clicks in. The plastic part covering the wooden table tray doesn’t cover it completely and my LO can his dirty/greasy hands and touch both the plastic and wood part so it’s two things to clean, instead of just one plastic tray. I hate it. SO MUCH CLEAN UP.
customer_reviews.author: Ph

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice looking high chair
customer_reviews.text: We have a different highchair that we got from the baby shower but it didn’t give my baby a good posture while sitting. Always leans on the side and there was really no cushioning and it’s a hassle to take parts out to wash in the washing machine. Finally bought this high chair and I’m glad I did. It’s not perfect but I’m happy with it. Cons: Shorter than our old high chair The tray is too small Those suction plates doesn’t stay on the tray The shoulder straps restrains falls off But other than this, I’m glad we made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Xutzen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this high chair for my great-niece who suffers from epilepsy and Autism. Her physical therapist highly recommended this Highchair/chair to go with her. She is 4 years old and just reached 27 pounds, so she will use this as a high chair for quite sometime. My only concern is the parts that hold the tray in place are made of plastic. A friend purchased one for his daughter with similar disabilities, and the plastic parts crack and break apart. He is contacting the manufacturer for a solution to this problem. I will update this review, when we find out what the manufacturer responds to his issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chair !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my baby to start solid food, we did not have any other baby chair at home and therefore wanted to invest the best kind. I read a lot of recommendations and I went plenty of stores to look at different models but they either look too plastic or takes too much space and I came across this chair from amazon site. This chair is amazing, it's beautiful, fits to our living room style, easy to clean w good safety features and a lot of room to grow !! My husband is also very pleased with purchase. I highly recommend this product to all mothers looking for good solid high chair.
customer_reviews.author: 5Gemini

customer_reviews.title: High quality chair, with a caveat
customer_reviews.text: The chair is sturdy and high quality. It is also easy to assemble. We bought it for the small footprint, which necessitates a wooden chair (and the higher $190 price tag we paid). A weak point of this chair is the way the tray attaches. The plastic parts holding the tray do not appear sturdy, and you can't pull the tray back far enough to get the baby in/out without removing the tray.

customer_reviews.title: Teeny Tray!
customer_reviews.text: Cute concept, but after spending all the time to assemble it , we sat her in it to find that the tray is just so tiny, food floor to tray ratio is 1-0. I tried a graco blossom and really liked it, but wanted this one b/c it was more like a piece of furniture since we have a small apartment. I think I am going to get a clip-on chair for our dining room and then go back to the Graco and leave it in the kitchen. The tray makes this high chair SO impracticable, I absolutely don't understand why almost no one wrote about this in their review.
customer_reviews.author: Sara C.

customer_reviews.title: Best highchair!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this highchair. It was recommended to us by a friend and I'm so glad we got it. It's basically a less expensive version of the Stokke Tripp Trapp but it's easier to clean in my opinion. We have a small apt and it fits nicely and goes well with our furniture without looking to "kiddish." It was very easy to assemble and is so easy to clean. A great feature is that you can adjust the levels/heights without using any tools to unscrew pieces. We even used it as an adult chair the other day for a haircut. One of the best baby purchases I've made. This chair will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lin

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Although it took some time to assemble this chair, I am very pleased with it. I resorted to the online video to aid in assembly because the booklet was not very clear. The clear, removable tray makes it very easy to clean, and the chair is very sturdy and comfortable. When the tray is removed, the baby can be moved close to the table and enjoy a meal with the rest of the family. Overall, this chair seems superior to more expensive wooden chairs I have seen, because of the tray component. The only issue I have encountered so far is that the seat is rather wide; too wide for many babies younger than 8-10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Samira

customer_reviews.title: cool chair
customer_reviews.text: I really love this chair. We debated getting it because its on the pricer side, and debated it vs the stokke tripp trapp. In the end I think this is a better highchair. It's just so much easier to get our son in and out of. It cleans easy and adjusts easily. It also has a decent looking design, which is important to us. I will update this review after a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: TheHadleyHome

customer_reviews.title: Love this Highchair
customer_reviews.text: This highchair is perfect. It's super easy to clean and looks real nice. Helps my son sit more ergonomically with the proper angles back and footrest. Love that it's adjustable. The tray is smaller than some other highchairs, but I prefer that. In his old highchair, he couldn't reach all of the tray anyway so it was just wasted space. It looks so much nicer than a plastic white chair. It doesn't fold-up, but that is not an issue for me. We use it all the time, so I probably wouldn't fold it up if it could anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA. Great quality and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! This is a great investment. Easy to clean without having to worry about bacteria growth on cloth or cushions like other chairs. I love that is at the perfect height to put at the dining table. The tray could be wider. It doesn't allow for wide bottom suction plates to work well since the tray is narrow so that's the one part I wish they update when I have to get a second chair. Thumbs up for being USA made. One of the reasons why I picked it. I'm all for USA manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Darling Wold

customer_reviews.title: High quality high chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair. Feels like very good quality. I took off the top harness because it seemed like overkill. I can slip my 10 month old in and out and am confident she's safe even without the buckle because the tray is so secure. Nice big tray and the plastic cover is convenient for washing. Food bits do get into the crevices with the straps but otherwise it's easy to clean. I'm very glad I purchased this and look forward to the versatility it will provide in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Heidenthal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, pretty and pulls right up to the table!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We were using an Ikea chair for a while (first timers), but it took up a lot of space, the bucket seat was big enough our kiddo would try and get out, there was no foot rest and we couldn't pull her right up to the table like we wanted. So we did some research between this and the tripp trapp and we are so happy we want with the Abiee. Super easy to assemble, pretty and we quickly moved from using a tray to pulling her right to the table. She is way more comfortable on the pads (because who wants to clean fabric?) and seems to love her "big girl" chair. Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth Wootan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful highchair!
customer_reviews.text: It was worth a little splurge to get this chair. It is much more visually pleasing than your average highchair, and it's sturdy and well made as well. The surfaces are all easily wipeable. My only (minor) complaint is that there's a silly "cup" depression on the plastic tray cover, which we will never, ever use for its intended purpose, and which mostly just gets in the way. But everything else is lovely, and our baby even enjoys pulling up and standing on it when he's done with meals.
customer_reviews.author: M. I. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Go buy this chair now!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was comparing this chair against the keekaroo, and tripp trapp chairs. The keekaroo didn't have the plastic piece between the legs, which we needed, and the tripp trapp was just too expensive for me to justify. This chair is totally comparable to the tripp trapp and more affordable! I will hands down be buying this chair again for the next child! I love that it can be used up to 200lbs. It easily adjusts as your child grows. The tray does need both hands to remove but worth every second! My little one loves it and so do i!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this high chair for around 9 months since my baby started solids. The chair looks nice and seems very comfortable for him. However, this chair is a HUGE pain to clean. The crotch buckle is almost impossible to remove because of the little black piece that goes between the legs. Food gets stuck around that and cannot be cleaned out. There are way too many crevices. Being a lazy mom, I'm ready to switch to a less attractive chair with a seamless design for easy wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these. One purchased by my daughters EI team when she needed feeding therapy and was too small for conventional high chairs. This Sat her at the perfect height and great posture for seating. At 2.5 she still uses it constantly and loves it. So of course we gor one for my now 6month old son. They both love it. I love than you can use it with the tray or slide it up to the table and use it without the tray.
customer_reviews.author: carissa

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best highchair I've purchased. My 4 and 2 year olds seemed to be struggling in their booster seats and never really seemed to be comfortable. After looking into more ergonomically correct options, I decided to try this one out. I was so impressed by it's functionality, but also how nice it looked! I ended up ordering a third one for my then 6 mto. They are on the pricey side, but for how long you'll use them and the quality - it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Ewert

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this chair. We are doing baby led weaning so it’s important to have a foot rest and proper positioning. We started at 6 months, my baby could hold himself up and sit unassisted for up to 5 mins. He always slumped over in this chair. He couldn’t reach the footrest adequately even though he is 29 in tall and messing with the footrest/chair positions, never fit him right. The tray was too small, I couldn’t use my suction mats. The tray is also a pain to operate. I returned the item as it was not practical for us.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks more like furniture. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice high chair. The last cheaper chair we had with our first granddaughter allowed her to slide down into a reclining position. I was always trying to set her up straight. So we ordered this high chair (which was fairly pricy) for the next granddaughter and expect to use it for years with future grand kids as well. It matches my dining room set and doesn’t take up as much room. Looks more like a real piece of furniture. Easy to clean. So far I’m very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KWeeks

customer_reviews.title: Great Classy Clean Cut Lines & Easy to Clean! Worth the Extra Money!
customer_reviews.text: This is so classy & Clean! Love it. The baby loves it & it can scoot right up to the table wo the tray ( be sure strapped in) or get close w tray. Looks great & I love the clean lines, wood & adjustable slots for the footrest. Ordered this instead of the busier ones with all the layers that are crumb magnets. The only reason I gave it a 4 is because our little guys bottom is very red if he sits in it for very long because the seat has a very hard cushion with little give. I think they could get the same results with a softer padded seat. But overall it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Arvey Krise

customer_reviews.title: Broke less than 14 months...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, good looking, relatively easy to clean. However- this was just a little over a year purchase- the plastic part already broke with no actual damage done to it. If you are a developer, you should know this is the easiest place to break down as it is the point the tray goes in. For their price range, I am very disappointed and regret not buying a less expensive, but sturdy option. I wish the company would send the replacement part. Sadly I can not return this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Random

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair!
customer_reviews.text: We had been using a bulkier, typical high chair but decided to try this one after using a similar one on a trip in Europe. Our son sits up better (was slouching in the other high chair) and seems to really like this one! He is more engaged at meals by being closer to the table (smaller tray) and at the same level as us eating. I love that you can just wipe the seat clean and straps are easy to clean as well! Wish I had known how great this high chair would be before receiving the other one!
customer_reviews.author: Cayla R.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for children
customer_reviews.text: I hope this review helps many parents who like me always like to compare products prior to purchase. Comparing products online is not easy so I ordered this chair plus the Heartwood chair priced at $6 less than this. This chair by far was the best one and best bang for your buck. It can be used as early as 6 months and on. It comes with a padded seat and backrest and also comes with a tray. The other chair I purchased was lacking all these for almost the same price. The seat cushion and back rest are easy to clean. I would recommend this product and wished I found it when my child was younger.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd high chair we’ve had over the years (3rd kid). With experience comes knowledge, right? After two other failed high chairs that were bulky/ hard to clean/ eye sore, etc. we finally found the one! We’ve been using this high chair for the last month and it’s so easy to clean, comfortable with easily removable padding that can be wiped clean. My older children even sit on it on occasion (for fun) and it’s so strong. This was well worthy the money. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Liddell

customer_reviews.title: It's Alright
customer_reviews.text: This chair does it's job. I like the sturdiness and design as well as the ability to grow with the baby as they get older. However, the legs aren't even. It's a little wobbly. I need to find a foam circle to put underneath so the chair doesn't wobble. Also, for some reason, I cannot properly tighten the harness so that it sits flush over my baby's shoulder. It sits flush on one side but is falling constantly on the other even with tightening it. Could be user error. Also, I wish the tray was bigger. I feel that I cannot purchase a plate/bowl small enough to lay completely flat on the tray.
customer_reviews.author: April Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for about a week now, and love it. It's sturdy, easily cleaned, and looks lovely. The baby is comfortable and likes being higher up (relative to our old high chair). The only feature I don't love are the tray latches -- they're the kind where you push down a button to get the tray on and off. I'd prefer something that doesn't need to be depressed with a single fingertip. But that's a pretty small quibble for an overall great high chair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent high chair!
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with this high chair! We were looking for an easy to clean high chair that fits in with our kitchen decor and was easy to move around our very small dining space. The Abiie Beyond High Chair has checked off all of our boxes and we love it! Our daughter loves that she's able to look around in the chair and reach all areas of the tray (her old one had a very high back that blocked her view and the tray was very large). It is easy to wipe down and I love that the tray topper can go in the dish washer.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute
customer_reviews.text: We decided we needed a better option for our twins and I'm so glad we went with this chair! I was a bit skeptical about the price but I can tell the chairs are well made and will last many years. I love that it will grow with them, and probably be able to get passed on as well. And they're cute to boot! I really like the blueberry color, and since we need two of them, it's great to have something that doesn't take up half the kitchen! Our girls seem content in their new seats and getting them in and out is a breeze. I'm really glad we made the jump.
customer_reviews.author: Sparksnsmoke

customer_reviews.title: Very practical as it grows with them
customer_reviews.text: My toddler grandson has just one problem with this chair. His shirt has gotten caught on the front guard a couple of times when he was climbing down. Going to see if I can remove it. Otherwise I love the chair and all of the features. Attractive too. Love that it can grow with him and not have to buy other products as he grows. Adjusts easily. Very sturdy. Because of the weight capacity I will be able to use it as extra seating when he is done with it. Very practical and less expensive than similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair overall but cushions stain easily
customer_reviews.text: I love how sturdy, adjustable, and sleek this high chair is. But after just a few weeks of use by my two year old, the cushions are stained despite us wiping them clean after every use. I feel disappointed that we spent so much on this chair for it to be stained so quickly. It is easy to clean each part overall but I can’t rate it any higher because of the stained cushions. I can’t imagine ow bad it will look six months from now or after it’s been used by a second child (I bought it as an investment planning to use it for all of our children).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!!
customer_reviews.text: We now have our very 1st granddaughter.....finally!! As she's growing, we find ourselves purchasing more & more gear in order to accommodate her needs. I did a bit of research online for high chairs. It was important that I find one that was somewhat compact and this definitely meets that criteria. It's very well made and was quick to assemble. It includes an adjustable footrest, which is not only beneficial for stability but also promotes a healthy sitting posture for your baby. In fact this entire can be adjusted to meet the needs of the toddler/child for years. The chair is super easy to clean and very very cute!! I'm 100% satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: liz lowry

customer_reviews.title: My toddler and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I am an addicted amazon shopper. When I leave reviews, I leave an honest review. This is an an amazing high chair. I was skeptical about the price being a bit higher than normal but trust me it’s worth it. My son is currently 2 and a half and I have to sit him down to feed him. Tired of chasing him around. It fits perfect and has all the height adjustments. I definitely recommend this chair. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Getahun

customer_reviews.title: Safe, sturdy, so easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have bought. Both superb! With the provided shoulder straps I believe any baby at the food eating stage would be safe in this chair. While being low profile (thankfully easy on the bare feet) it has a safe center of gravity so no real tip-over worry. The wooden tray with plastic over top means that baby can happily play on the wooden part once done eating so daddy :) or mommy can get those dishes and the plastic tray clean and ready for next time before baby starts to fuss. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: PCO Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chair Exists
customer_reviews.text: I went a WAY too long before buying this chair. I was using a plastic chair that my daughter constantly rocked and moved around. Although it was secure it would just move a little and my daughter thought that was the best game to place at dinner instead of eating. This chair is fantastic....Easy to clean.......easy to set up.......sturdy.......I have no problems with it and will be getting another one for baby #2!
customer_reviews.author: San Diego - Unlisted

customer_reviews.title: Excellent High Chair
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this high chair for my 7 month old. It was recommended to us by our physical therapist. I like how the seat raises and lowers, as well as the footrest. This allows my baby to have proper positioning and sit up correctly to eat. The chair cleans well and easily. We used the directions that came with the chair to assemble it instead of watching the video. It might be a little easier if you watch the video instead.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Loafman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Overall, we’re really happy with this high chair. Originally we were frustrated bc shipping took a week longer than projected (amazon shipped, not Abiie) and when we received the chair, two of the bolts necessary to assemble the chair weren't included. We reached out to customer service and received the bolts within a week. A frustrating start, but our little one is happy sitting in the chair, and it truly is SO easy to clean the entire thing. No hidden nooks and crannies for crumbs to hide! That said, it has gotten a bit wobbly after a couple months of use, so we will likely have to tighten bolts from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It can be better
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair overall but putting in and out of the tray is quite troublesome as it requires two hands. Also I wish they made something that can stick in front of the chair so I don’t have to buckle my baby with the seatbelt every time. I have a stokke but it is too expensive so I wanted something similar but less expensive. Well, honestly I still like stokke better.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia C

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I guess there is no perfect chair... It’s not very easy to clean: the material is textured and if some food drys up you’d have to scrap it with a soapy sponge. My LO bent the back foam layer, so it is sticking out now. The freight flaw- while 4 straps easily removable, the one between the legs is screwed dead, and that’s the one that gets the dirtiest. Also the table is too small, no flat plate can fit on, just bowls and cups. Other than that it’s a loved purse of furniture
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great for twins!
customer_reviews.text: If you need 2 high chairs this is great for you! Easy to clean, small footprint, great for premie/small babies. The tray is easy to take off and clean (especially with twins, cleaning 2 trays every time this is really easy to deal with). Only one negative - takes 2 hands to open the tray because you need to push buttons on each side. Not ideal if you are holding a baby while trying to open this. That said.. I love it, and would still buy again. Also the bar under to hang bibs is kinda cool too.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Nice looking chairs!
customer_reviews.text: We have had two of these chairs for two years now and love them. sturdy, well built. fairly easy to clean - I love how the seat pads and straps all remove for cleaning. My dog chewed one of the straps, so I gave them a call today and spoke to Ben - he put in an order for replacement straps and said I'll received them in a matter of days. Happy customer! :) I would definitely recommend these chairs for tight spaces - so much smaller than the gigantic plastic high chairs.
customer_reviews.author: L_K

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine a couple months now and with once a day use, and cleaning, the laminate is bubbled in several places. Whe we used the tray it was very difficult to remove, needed both hands. It is good looking and a good size but not the easiest to clean but not the worst with the straps and my son likes to move the back and shove food between the cushion and the seat. My biggest issue is the bubbling which has made it look super cheap and I'm worried it will not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy wooden chair.
customer_reviews.text: Compared with many other high chairs, price of this wooden one is kind of high but still affordable. My baby is about five and a half months old now, she was afraid of sitting on the chair at first, while now she is so happy to have food on it. The quality is good as expected and the craft is good as well. Wish that baby would love and use it for long long time.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Blends Right Into the Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is amazing! It is perfect! It's so easy to clean. The cushions pull up easily to clean beneath, and the tray is translucent and seamless. The tray snaps off easily with one hand. The chair is light weight enough to move easily from my kitchen to dining room, but sturdy enough my baby ( a climber) can't tip it over. Tall enough that it's comfortable to feed him from my kitchen island (he sits short, bit still feels involved in the action), but short enough to pull up perfectly to the dining room table. It looks so stylish and modern. My husband, baby, and I LOVE this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the tray
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this high chair but while it is attractive it also falls short in a few key aspects. The tray is my primary disappointment, it is not only far to small to be practice it is also very hard to take on and off. The button on one side sticks out too far and therefore the teeth gets stuck taking it on and off. I do love that this chair will grow with my baby and it does look great
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It’s pretty pricey but it should last years and years since it turns into a regular chair. One huge downfall for me is that the clear tray scratched using a non abrasive sponge and now it is cloudy in one spot and looks like I’ve abused it. Literally happened the first week :/ It keeps my little sitting up straight as the seat material is not slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Like how it matches my dining area
customer_reviews.text: I received mine with one side of the acrylic tray holder not fitting on the side bar leaving a small gap, either the slot for it is too small or that acrylic thing is slightly bigger. And I noticed the wood finish isn’t as perfect but I don’t think that’s an issue. Overall i like it, it goes so well with my kitchen and dining area and feels sturdy enough for my baby girl.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Hassle getting baby out of.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of tha high chair, its sturdy & easy to clean. But one HUGE issue is getting baby out of it. There is a padded seat on the chair that is basically just sitting on top with nothing to keep it from moving. So when you go to get the baby out it gets stuck on babys legs & it's just a hassle to get the baby out. Why is wasnt tested & a solution to fix this before this went to market. And for the price this chair should be perfect. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is strong, beautiful and functional. I'm a 240lb bodybuilder and I can sit in it with no fear of it breaking. My daughter loves it...it's easy to clean and just an overalll great purchase. We thought the fact that it wasn't counter height would be an issue, but it's not. It's perfect size...we can feed her when we're on the couch or at the kitchen island eating ourselves. Oh, it was pretty easy to put together also. Just a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: UGK26

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful grow-with high chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful high chair that will grow with your child. The seat is padded and come with safety straps. I especially like the plastic Snap-on tray top that is so very easy to clean. My grandson love to sit in his chair and I love that it will be used for more than months. With the growth features built in, my grandson will be using this chair for several years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kramer

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: To be honest i wasn't expecting it to be so high quality. Great wood material, and seat cushion. Easy to adjust the height for different children. The only downside for some people may be that it is heavy, but that is due to it not being made of plastic but solid wood material. I have been using this product for 2 1/2 years and it looks like new still.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Top Shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for little kids and as the grow up, it makes as a great chair (if you're slinder build)!!! Highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Smith

customer_reviews.title: High quality and fantastically designed.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is the best-designed product of furniture I have constructed. I can't tell if the kid will like it yet but it was a joy to build it. Everything was laid out very logically and it feels like a lot of thought went into the design of this chair. It's up there with Amish quality. I'll update with the kid experience later.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Overall great !
customer_reviews.text: The chair is pretty decent quality and it’s easy to put together. A few things I wish were different: - be careful with the tray when you remove and attach it. My baby’s finger got caught a few times :/ - the straps are annoying!! Babies put everything in their mouth and the extra slack just kind of hang down. It’s super easy for the baby to grab and eat it, all the time! - food and crumbs get stuck all over the chair and tray but it’s easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy...should last through a couple more kids and beyond
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy chair which became obvious as I put it together. There were a lot of lock nuts but that adds to the strength just makes it tedious to put together. Love most things about it so far and so does my baby. Easy to wipe down, has enough cushion and easily adjustable. The only thing I’m not the biggest fan of is the way the you have to put the tray on/off. It’s these push button glides that break my nails and aren’t easy to press. That portion is poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: LadyTee

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a chair which did not have too much plastic and was simple in its design. We decided against the pricier Stokke but Abiie Beyond looks pretty similar. We find it easy to operate, have not had trouble at all to clean it - the padding is made of some kind of plastic material and the wood frame is underneath, so wiping it down is pretty fast. The chair is sturdy, the buckle works fine, no complains. I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a simple sturdy chair with no reclining options or additional extras.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Straps get loose and tray is little
customer_reviews.text: So only used for a couple weeks so.... pros: A lot smaller than your average high chair. Easy to clean. Cons: straps get loose easily, child plate size won't fit on tray, clear tray attachment hard to take off and put on. Toddler keeps knocking his drink off on accident because there isn't much space. He hardly did that with his old high chair that was more spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and simple
customer_reviews.text: I previously had the ingenuity smart clean trio for my 7 month baby, we are baby led weaning and needed something way to clean. The other one was too bulky. I love this High chair, I purchased in black so it can match our kitchen. My baby can almost sit with us pulled up to our table without a tray needed, it’s so small and compact I love the simplicity and it’s sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Anel

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the modern grandma's house.
customer_reviews.text: I love how this chair slides right up to the table. My 10 mo granddaughter loves to sit with the grownups at dinner (and throw stuff on the floor). The chair is sturdy, well made and I like how the padded seat comes off for cleaning. I am so glad I bought this. Looks good too, we always have it at the dining table.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Grows with Child
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter when she started to sit with the family at the table when she was about 6 months old. The five point securing harness worked well. She’s 2 1/2 now and due to the ability to adjustments, she’s still using this high chair. Easy to clean. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Chair - very sturdy and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and this chair for the price was about the best. only problem, one of the angled parts had the hole drilled on the wrong side!! They are two identical bracing pieces, but the pre-drilled hole (holes) were on the wrong side of one the pieces of wood. had no time to return, so gave to a carpenter friend to correct. this is the only reason I'm giving two stars, otherwise it's a sturdy, nice high chair. QC should catch these mistakes before getting to the consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Beth B.

customer_reviews.title: Great highchair
customer_reviews.text: This highchair works really well. It was easy to put together and is easy to get baby in and out of. I love that it has a place for his feet to rest and is adjustable as he grows. Highly recommend! Side benefit - it's cute and has a retro look that's easier on the eyes than most highchairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, great quality, comfortable, and easy to clean high chair!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness I could now have asked for an easier to assemble and beautiful high chair! My daughter loves it and it is truly a gorgeous chair the wood is top quality. The instructions are slightly out of date as it says to assemble some parts that are already assembled!!!!! I kept stopping and second guessing myself the instructions and videos were so straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Small High Chair Tray Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful high chair but it is small. I didn't know how much smaller it would be. It's still nice and my lo is 13 months so I don't really put his food on a plate yet but when he gets older I wont even be able to use the high chair try. You can see a comparison of this tray table and one from Graco.
customer_reviews.author: NicoRey

customer_reviews.title: Cool design, terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great and is easy to clean. Great idea, but VERY POORLY EXECUTED!! I bought in July of 2019 (so not a year old yet) 1)The slide in wood tray cracked 3x. (I sent it back twice and they replaced it. 3rd time, we just stopped using the tray. 2) a screw has stripped out on the bottom leg somehow and won’t tighten. Definitely not safe. I’m in the process of returning now hoping for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Spent a long time looking for a high chair that would blend in with our furniture. So far, this has been the right chair (for the price). Cushions are easy to wipe down, my husband put it together relatively quickly, and it looks nice! My son loves it too, and seems to be comfortable. Only cons (IMO): - the tray clicks into place and you need two hands. I didn’t think this would be an issue until I dropped the tray on my toe getting my kiddo out. - it doesn’t fold away. For us, this was not an issue, as we like the way it looks and we have the space!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research I decided to go with this high chair because of the reviews and have no regrets, I love it. It’s super easy to clean by wiping down and removable tray that can be easily washed. The straps are very secure, adjustable and can also be easily wiped. Removing the tray is not hard at all and can be even down with one hand. It’s also lightweight and does not take up much space. My boyfriend assembled the chair and he said it was time consuming but not hard to do. Overall we’ve been using it for almost 3 months and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this chair to help with our son's feeding therapy program. He is age 7 and this was a great chair as it could hold an older child while still keeping a crotch piece in place so that he couldn't slip out of the chair on us. He now loves this chair as it gives him more support for his low tone and a place to rest his feet versus a regular chair.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: This is our second one!
customer_reviews.text: We love this high chair. So much that we purchased two. My 4 yr old still loves "his chair" and now my 8 month old has his own. Our older child's friends always want to sit in it when they come over. Sometimes I find myself sitting in it -- It's so comfortable and has great back support. My 8 month old has much better posture eating in this chair which is important when learning to eat his solids. Still love the footprint and how it fits with our home's style. Still finding it super easy to clean and the first chair we bought has held up so well-- It looks just as good as the brand new one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Proper position for baby to eat!
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed with a lower cost, mostly plastic, but popular highchair. My granddaughter was leaning back! Bad position for eating and learning to self-feed. This chair keeps her in the proper position. It is sturdy and adjustable. We have used it with the tray and without (pulled up to the table). She is comfortable and no longer slouching. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: 3 boys raised in these chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair as a gift for our Nephew's baby. Our daughter had one for each of her boys, now ages 17, 14 and 8. The 8 year old still sits on his in the lowest position. The chairs have been great! I've even sat on them when a crowd is there. Great workmanship, durable, easy care. Good job!
customer_reviews.author: JoeK

customer_reviews.title: Love this high chair!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this high chair per a friend's recommendation after using another and disliking it for several reasons. This one is fantastic and solved all our problems with our other. It fits better at our table - the legs don't stick out as far, and yet it still feels quite sturdy. It's easier, by far, to clean. It looks so much better - much less clunky. And, most importantly, our baby sits more comfortably in it and is therefore eating much more confidently! She loves mealtimes now when before they were becoming a chore for all of us. Highly recommend this high chair!
customer_reviews.author: cbonsai

customer_reviews.title: Tray warped with use, but good and compact chair
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the versatility of this high chair and was so excited initially. Materials seem to be high quality for the entire chair except for the wood tray. Within two months, the tray warped. I did not submerge the tray in water to clean- just wiped with a damp cloth(food sometimes gets on the edge of the tray, even with the plastic guard). For now, I can still maneuver the tray onto the chair, but I fear this will not last as long as my 8month old will need this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Kyledaboy

customer_reviews.title: Well built chair
customer_reviews.text: Great high chair. We own 2 of the Svan Signet chair for our first 2 and enjoyed the slim line design and style of this chair, and which we have to compare to. Although the Abiie is a well built chair it’s wide foot print is less than desirable, not great for small spaces I imagine. Relatively easy to clean although adjustment crevices create bit of a chore to clean, but no more of a hassle than the Svan. Where we think this chair excels is in adjustment, the Svan would require tools and significant time to adjust to growing children. Where as the Abiie can be quickly adjusted. Very handy when switching between users, which we have daily.
customer_reviews.author: triple

customer_reviews.title: Better than Tripp Trapp
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Padding on seat very comfortable. Adjustments on seat and foot heights are simple. Tray is too small and the plastic cover just gets in the way for my toddler grandchild, but these are easily removed so you can scoot the chair right up to the table. It would be fine for a younger baby. I removed the rigid crotch barrier, which was easy as it will be if I have to reinstall it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Bayham

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is perfect in so many ways! Relatively easy to put together, looks nice, and our kid seems comfortable and safe in it. The removeable tray with plastic cover is very convenient and ideal for baby led weaning or feeding in general - the cover can be easily removed and washed. Great value for money and good quality. Give this one a serious thought before purchasing any other high chair!
customer_reviews.author: ZP

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased another chair and it was so hard to clean also the tray was very difficult to remove. This chair is really nice and though one of the more expensive chairs on the market it's well worth the price. Very glad I purchased this for my 2yr old. It's not the easiest to assemble but I'm not one to read instructions. I had to read them to attach the tray pieces which was annoying. Other than that it's a great chair.
customer_reviews.author: Principessa386

customer_reviews.title: Great High Chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair and I highly recommend it. Its solid and very stylish. The only thing that I will mention that is a con is that the blue foam sticks out from the back. Not sure if its suppose to or not. Its not flat with the wood and leaves a gap. So, If your little one turns or grabs that would be a concern as it could damage it. Its not enough to regret the buy. Again, great buy and it does seem like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Great chair. Avoid heat.
customer_reviews.text: Our 1 year old is much more comfortable in this chair than she was in her clip-on, at-the-table chair. We find this to be a good height, easy to clean, and easy on the eyes. Knocking off one star since the foam warped it's shape after we had lunch on the deck on a mildly warm day, of roughly 75 degrees Fahrenheit. It is still usable, but doesn't lay flush with the chair anymore.
customer_reviews.author: dcsea

customer_reviews.title: I want another!
customer_reviews.text: Love it - I assembled it by myself in about 15 minutes. I love the materials and the overall look. I bought this for my 9 month old, but my 2 year old, husband, and I have all tried it out and found it comfortable and functional. It takes seconds to adjust and is really easy to clean. At some point I plan to purchase another to replace our plastic high chair/booster combo that my 2 year old uses.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love the abiie
customer_reviews.text: I spent 6 months (500+!meals) being annoyed with the daily struggle of cleaning our keekaroo chair and have no regrets with switching to the abiie after one short week of use! The abiie is both cute and functional, super easy to clean and modify for height adjustments. The cushions are easy to move for deep cleaning and the straps wipe down easily and are removable as well. I really like this chair and would recommend it for anyone looking for a woooden furniture feel chair, especially over the keekaroo (so cute but annoying buckle and hard to clean without disassembling with Allen wrench).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefect high chair
customer_reviews.text: We looove this chair. It was expensive, but worth it. We have used other cheaper chairs that family members have had but they all seem to recline way too much. This chair sits up perfectly and is easily adjustable and easy to clean. I’d buy a second/third one for grandparents houses if it wasn’t so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Plastic highchairs look cheap and out of place in my opinion. The Abiie chair looks really nice with the rest of my furniture. You can immediately tell this is a HIGH QUALITY piece. We had a little issue with the foot board and the company replaced it within three days, so awesome. I love that they stood behind their product. Super easy to clean too. The seat cushions completely remove to wash with a sponge. Very few places for food to get trapped. I'm pretty meticulous about cleanliness and this chair gets an A+ for that too.
customer_reviews.author: Janglz

customer_reviews.title: Just a very well made chair!
customer_reviews.text: It took just 20 min to unwrap and put together. Assembly was a cake walk and the materials are sturdy. The weak point may be the plastic sleeves the tray slides into, I will keep a close eye on this to see how it holds up, everything else is rock solid. We only have a week of use on this chair but it’s beautiful and we love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: magnum

customer_reviews.title: The best high chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. The best purchase ever. Very easy to clean and sturdy. Saves my day after messy feeding. My toddler still loves to sit on his chair. After two years, still looks like brand new, no mess, very clean. I recommend this chair to my new parents-to be friends.
customer_reviews.author: Alta

customer_reviews.title: We look forward to using the high chair
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this chair way in advance of our baby being able to use it. It was easy to assemble (good directions), and it looks lovely. I have not rated how ready to clean, since we have not experienced that yet! We look forward to using it!
customer_reviews.author: Novakpiano

customer_reviews.title: Not so awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a mediocre but very well marketed chair. I had this chair, 4 moms and now i have Graco, which i love most of all. What I didn’t like was that it actually looks ugly, it’s hard to clean the straps and if you take those off it’s easy for your baby to fall ot of it. It also does not look comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Great for our small space!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great so far. We were using a hook-on fabric chair because we have a small condo, but it was such a pain to clean it every night. This is so much easier, and tucks in nicely under our table. We didn't end up using the tray or the back cushion, so that's even less to clean. One of the shoulder straps was broken upon arrival, so we are just using the 3-point lap belt. Contacted Abiie customer service - they responded in less than 12 hours, and 24hrs later, they had shipped us a replacement part and provided the tracking number. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, terrible tray
customer_reviews.text: Really great and compact high chair, it doesn't take up too much room and I like that my son can grow with it ---- BUT the tray is a terrible design. It's hard to get latched and the wood expands when you wipe it with water and with humidity now I can't get the tray to align with the chair . The customer service is good, they are supposed to send me another tray - but it should redesigned
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with this high chair! I love that it doesn't take up much space and is so easy to clean. The tray is plenty big imo, but I don't put the plate or bowl on it since she's still being fed by me. All her favorite toys fit fine for play time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Northrup

customer_reviews.title: and so far its been great. My little one likes sitting in it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this high chair for my 5 month old. I've had it for about 1 week, and so far its been great. My little one likes sitting in it, shes good for about 15-20 mins the cushion seems comfy for her and easy to clean. It came packaged really well, not damaged. My husband was able to put it together in about an hour. Its not a bulky high chair, its great for small places and the design is nice. Overall great product, I like that is comes with a 3 year manufactured warranty too.
customer_reviews.author: M.H

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Nice Looking - Grandson Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair - perfect for toddler to young child and more I bought this for my grandson who is 4 and will be starting some new therapies in a few weeks. He loves it. It's comfortable, seat is very roomy and it's nice there is a shelf for his feet. Nice to move away from 'high chair' look for infants. His "big boy' chair...... we did puzzles last night and it pulled right up to dining table. Very very sturdy and safe. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: TMWCali

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wood high chair! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair. I did a lot of research before buying and compared to several other priced brands. This high chair is awesome! I have 6 kids so I have had several and this one tops them all. My 2 yr old easily climbs in and out. It pulls up to our island and is the perfect height. It seems comfy and it’s not hard to clean despite some reviews I read. It all comes apart for easy cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Safe, sturdy and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing chair! It does come all in pieces but there is a video and an app to guide you through: my son did it without any technical assistance in about 25 minutes. It's sturdy as can be and it seems it will last through this kid, the one they are considering AND a nanny, as it holds up to 250 lbs........and I believe it. It's really easy to move for me and the five point restraint system kept the baby safe and secure . Really nice chair.
customer_reviews.author: ExTxn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I love this high chair!! We had a cheap one and my baby started rocking back and forth on it and it worried me. This one is much more stable, plus it looks great. Easy to clean, just move the cushion if anything gets stuck. It was way more than I wanted to spend on a high chair, but I'm glad I did. It's nice knowing it'll fit her for years--she is 12 months old and we've had this chair for a couple months now. I put it together myself in about 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Alethea Bright Cudlip

customer_reviews.title: Love this high chair
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this high chair. It’s easy to adjust and clean. My son has autism and sensory processing disorder, so proper positioning during mealtime is very important. If he doesn’t feel “grounded” he doesn’t eat. This is the 4th high chair we have tried and it’s been such a huge success.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Ryden

customer_reviews.title: We love our chair and this company
customer_reviews.text: This chair is pretty easy to put together - takes around 30 mins. It arrived with a slightly cracked plastic table top and the company immediately sent us a new one (really, it arrived 2 days later), along with a lovely email apologizing. Fantastic service! The only thing is the seat cushions are not super easy to take off to clean. This is a problem when food gets stuck in the cracks. But, even with that, we love it! It looks really nice in our dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: A great highchair for years to come --moves into child seat at the table easily.
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the wooden aspect of this highchair make you think it would be hard to clean. Wrong. the top part of the tray removes to wash, the cushioning is easily wiped off. And everything removes easily--the tray, the cushion back, etc. Great chair. Took longer than cheaper highchairs to put together but you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: christine e thompson

product_meta.title: Abiie Beyond Wooden High Chair with Tray. The Perfect Adjustable Baby Highchair Solution for Your Babies and Toddlers or as a Dining Chair. (6 Months up to 250 Lb) (Mahogany Wood - Olive Cushion)
feature_bullets: EZ-Seat: The High chair can be transformed to any height position to use as a Toddlers chair or as a traditional dinning chair for all ages, all within less than 20 seconds! It's economical and instantly provides an extra chair to your home when needed. No tools needed for adjustment.
Warranty: 3 year Manufacturer’s Warranty included with optional low cost 1/2/3 years extended protection plans.
Dual Restraint System: The restraint system can be adjusted for a 5-point harness or a 3-point harness, keeping your loved one secure and comfortable.

Ease of Cleaning: The chair is designed with several easy access points for parents to clean up. The stain resistant cushions make cleaning a breeze. Just a quick wipe with a damp cloth will remove any mess or dirt left by your child. The cushion is waterproof so unexpected spills aren't absorbed. The one-hand removable tray cover is dishwasher Safe.

Safety: Anti-Microbial Heat Sterilization. The High Chair wood went through a state-of-the art pressure-assisted high-temperature sterilization at 248 °F (120 ° C) ensures a hygienic environment for your child.

specifications.Material free: BPA Free Latex Free Lead Free Phthalate Free
specifications.Best uses: Adjustable Baby High Chair, Toddler or Adult dining Chair
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,395 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
